tier_1_determinative.voluntary_causing_or_attempting_death_hu: Forcible removal of taxi from the driver's custody.

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Charanjit Singh Gill vs. The State of Maharashtra & Anr.
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.judges_coram: Revati Mohite Dere & Manjusha Deshpande, JJ.
tier_4_procedural.counsel_for_appellant: Mr. Anand Mishra i/b Mr. Ashok M. Saraogi

residual_details.additional_facts: The petition was disposed of with liberty to file an appropriate proceeding before the appropriate forum/Court as maintainable in law. The court did not go into the merits of the petitioner's complaint.
